content: In 1992, Marion Tinsley (1927-1995), the seemingly unbeatable World Checker Champion, defended his title against the computer program CHINOOK, in a series of games, of which he won 4, lost 2, and drew 33. This was the first time ever that a human world champion defended his title against a computer.
translations: ita:Nel 1992, l'apparentemente imbattibile campione mondiale di dama Marion Tinsley (1927-1995) ha difeso il suo titolo cont
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
